storyInfo: Away from the sea and returned to the coast, an awakened Specter collates anew the fragments of her ego through her interactions with the Abyssal Hunters and Irene.

attributes.content: On behalf of Ægir, I hereby accept you as an Abyssal Hunter.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: I will be your captain, and more than that, your teacher.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: The ocean has permitted our hunt, and no pest will have anywhere to hide.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: I will follow you, and I will hunt.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Arise, Laurentina.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Yes, Captain.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Have you ever danced before?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: I attended dance classes once, but I'm not too well-practiced, Captain.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Proficiency or lack thereof does not affect the emotional reach of one's dance.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Step forward, and take my hand.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Before I formally begin your training in slaughter, I would first like for you to comprehend—
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Your life skills.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Let us begin.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Take in the rhythm. Come—
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Gran Faro, Iberia
So... like this?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Yes. Step to the rhythm, keep your feet light, and leave the rest to me.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Bow, and... wave, and... twirl, and... stop.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Yes, not bad, Skadi.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: The captain might just be dying to be your dance partner by now.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: That's not funny at all, Shark...
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Oh, my, really?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Heheh.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Seems your recovery's gone well.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: How could it not, with someone as considerate as you caring for me?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: You still love to babble. No change at all.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Who else but you could praise me sooo sincerely? Do I owe you a word of thanks?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Hmm, now that I think about it, I really do, don't I? A real thank-you from the heart.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: For what?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: For... caring for me.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: No dry-lander could ever hold me down, when the other me had the onset.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: And no one else would've been able to drag me back to that hospital bed, either.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Skadi.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I'm just... so happy to have found an Abyssal Hunter on the shore.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: There's you, my captain, the captain of the Second, and I haven't seen any other Hunters.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Protecting my teammates is my duty.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: And that's that.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Thank you, Skadi.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: You're welcome, Shark.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Anyway, now that I've taught you the charm of dance, do you think you could teach me the secrets of song?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: The other me's singing could stand to be a little easier on the ears. I want a professional to help tune me up.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I thought it was quite nice.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: But I still want to sing my own song.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I can teach you. But be sure to learn, Shark.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I'll be a model student.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: (She breaks into melodious song.) ♪
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: (She breaks into jumping refrain.) ♪
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Lower your voice a little more. Hold your breath steady in your abdomen.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I'll give it a shot.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Excuse me.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Top of the morning, Captain.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: 2nd Captain.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Skadi, Kal'tsit's looking for you.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Kal'tsit?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Mm. She has a need to conduct more focused medical tests on you.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Alright. I'll go now.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: See you in a bit. Shark, 2nd Captain.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: See you.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: What a shame, I wanted to sing a little more.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Any plans right now?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Our time is limited. We cannot return to Rhodes Island to resupply.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Kal'tsit will take charge of allocating resources aboard it.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Iberia's Saint pledges the Penal Battalion will assist our movements. They will be an important backer in our return to Ægir.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Sounds like you've got this all worked out.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Considering the scale of the Seaborn swarm, our chances of making headway into Ægir with the resources we have are dim.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: But finding a path to reach a specific strategic goal is my duty as a Designer of Warfare.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: However, my worries do not end there.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Ægir's cities cover the ocean, and I have been lucky to visit the majority.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: But the city we saw... I have no recollection of.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: I know not its scale, nor the particulars of its construction, nor whether it meets the Academy-enacted standards.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Well, that's a hump.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Thus, before we enter it, we must prepare as well as we can.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Once the time is ripe, then whatever the city's encountered, whatever developments have taken place in Ægir...
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: I'm sure I will be able to give you both a full account.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Well, just give me a shout whenever you need something cut. Me and my saw will be waiting.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Mm.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Laurentina, do you have a moment?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: The sea breeze feels nice today, doesn't it.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Let's take a walk, Captain.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: (She deeply inhales—and exhales—)
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Feels just great to be back to myself.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I'm glad you've managed to free yourself from the Originium's effects.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: I can still hear the ocean waves, after all. I can still smell the salt in the water.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I'm stable for now. I can keep a hold on myself.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: If I head too far from the sea though...
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I'm not too sure.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: You needn't force yourself. You've done very well.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: I've gained a new understanding of myself, actually. Odds are good the other me would eagerly devote herself to my goals.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I think me and me will get along just fine.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Kal'tsit and I have discussed this. She is to assist in resolving any intractable problems you face.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: As with the matter of Skadi, this is part of our mutual cooperation agreement.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Thank you, I mean it.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Now how about we saunter ourselves out of town for a little art appreciation?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Right here.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: See it? That big, upright crag, way over yonder.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Very abstract.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Very...
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Specter pauses to assemble the words to describe this unique boulder, eaten away at by the sea breeze.
From the front, it resembles an old woman cloaked in rough hemp, but with just a few steps to the side, it becomes a follower in silent prayer.
As if it is possibility itself made tangible. It is one, yet many. For a while, at least, it actually leaves her at a loss for words.
Very beautiful.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: The wind erosion's endowed the sculpture with a multidimensional sort of tension.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Do you want to make it your own work?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Mine?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: No, I'm not qualified.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: It's a complete piece already. Chiseling any more? Practically profane.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Ahh, it sucks that we'd never get art like this in Ægir's cities, though.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: In the ocean, we have subjugated nature. That inherently comes with a cost.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Still, I'm happy I got to see a miracle like this.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: You'd need the endorsement of an elite technician to sculpt a statue this big back in Ægir, and then you'd have to pay to use the extruder, or spend even more buying stone that works.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: And then you rent one of the big sculpting tables, and make sure your sculptor's hands don't make a single damn mistake.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: You shed all that blood and sweat and it's just to reach the starting line. Welcome to the next few months of your life: that stone is your baby now.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Goodbye to your everyday quibbles and daily meals. You must even forsake your flashes of inspiration with every ruthless bone in your body. Pour it all into the stone.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Give everything you have to raise it. Shave away its impurities. Breathe life into it.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: In the end, it's forced to suffer the appraisal of the masses, and I know I'll hear some COMPLETELY unreasonable commentary on it.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: This is the vocation you were meant to take then?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Someone told me a joke once. Goes something like this.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Why do they call a sculptor a technician, and not an artist?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Because their main job is sculpting for the Academy, and of course those eggheads would turn artistic expression into pure science.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Heh-heh~
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: You're laughing quite a bit.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Oh, wow, am I? Whoof.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I just thought describing it like that might help you understand why I love that boulder so goddamn much.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Merely a fluke of time.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Yep. A fluke achieved by time and nature.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: It's the coincidental things in life that make my chest jump with glee.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Mind if we sit here for a sec? I want to admire it a little more.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: By all means.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Captain.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Want some fin jerky?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Disclaimer: the workmanship's a little shoddy.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: You mean to say hunger weighs on you?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: This won't sate it. Just gives my taste buds a little stimulation, and me the joy of chewing.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: It's unnecessary.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: It really, really is.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Want to try?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: (She takes the fin jerky.)
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Seems you're a real stranger to snacks.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: (She quietly chews.)
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Dry, stiff, overseasoned.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: But it's convenient. It can put some of the feeling of life back in you.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Every time I did well enough in my studies, my parents'd shove a bag of fin jerky just like this into my hands.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: The bag WAS more refined than this, though. More vivid.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: You were fortunate to have blood relatives who approved of and supported you.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: But they gave me plenty of grief, too.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: The woman who raised me was the one tasked with planning city domes.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: And my father, well, he was in charge of engineering and realizing her creations.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I am familiar with the material on your parents, from when we were recruiting Abyssal Hunters.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: I always drifted wherever they went, watching the domes in my mother's blueprints gradually take shape, watching the cities sprawl out from the seabed in all directions.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Her artistic sensibilities influenced the children born under those domes, myself included.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: City after city, dome after dome.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I witnessed the majesty of creating something from nothing, plus the joy of starting all over again.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: She saved the abyssal sea, plucking it out from the nihilistic dark.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: And I hoped I could be someone like her.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Every city I stayed at gave me the chance to choose. Music, sport, drawing. Experiencing Ægir's rich culture in the concrete details broadened my horizons.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I thought I'd be choosing forever, until I saw that statue. It was then I decided to become a sculptor myself.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: How valuable that gigantic, flawless, snow-white figure seemed, stood before the gloom of the ocean. You gazed up at it, looked over its posture, and unconsciously, you went to mimic it.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: That was prayer. That was hope.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: And maybe those exact hints are what made the other me so happy to accept the identity of a Church sister.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I will not judge. It was your choice.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: And here I was, all ready for you to lecture me. There's a damn pity.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Being chosen to become an Abyssal Hunter far from implies that you must renounce the right to pursue your dreams.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: So what's your dream, then, Captain?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: To hold on until the light of the cities once again blankets the ocean, sit on the red velvet benches of an Ægir opera house, and watch another production.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Let us rise. We've rested for long enough. It's time we return to town.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: In a few more hours, once the sun sets, the starry sky will reveal itself.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: You seem very fond of the night sky.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Specks of light flickering in the heavens, those heavens as deep and boundless as the ocean.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Aren't you a fan?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: It may shake me, but not enough to make me sentimental.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: It is not as if we are clueless regarding anything above sea level.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: While the little apprentice sculptor I am tried so futilely to turn an instant into an eternity, the skies had already made eternity as colorful as every instant in it.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: How can I not be moved?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: It seems living on dry land has awakened your passion as an artist.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: This land's put me through enough agony, that's all.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Washed ashore and desiccated in the sun, taken away and filled with Originium by a bunch of sad, pathetic asses, and now I have to endure the reality of the Seaborn fraternizing with me.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: So, carpe diem. I have to live it up. Use my passionate love for the arts to add a bit of seasoning to my life.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: You should understand that better than I do, Captain.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Art doesn't betray, it only draws a line between beautiful and ugly.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: And I'm so glad I still understand this little piece of beauty.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: The town is before us. We still have many matters to deal with today.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Thank you for bringing me this momentary joy, Shark.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Hold on a moment.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: We've got the perfect chance. I'd like you to agree to a humble request of mine.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: May I have this dance, Gladiia?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: (She presents her hand.)
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Heh.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: It would be my honor, Laurentina.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.text: Upon withered plains, daughters of the sea spryly begin to dance.
The sea winds provide accompaniment, while the leaves respond in kind.
For a fleeting moment, sorrow and anguish are nowhere, and life's joys fill the world.
Abyssal Hunters are bound by blood.
A dance draws to a close.

attributes.content: It's been so long since I shared a dance. I very much enjoyed it.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Too right. And I've never danced a dance like that before.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: A moist, damp dance on dried-out meadows.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Oh, if it isn't the cute little Iberian bird.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: She was heading to the coast towards the lighthouse. Did she want another look at it?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: The Sea Terrors there are long since annihilated. What business could she have?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Who knows?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Are we heading back to work now, Captain?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Many details remain to be discussed with both Kal'tsit and the old Iberian.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Then I'll keep strolling out here a little longer. Make sure our little bird returns to the nest safe and sound.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: See you.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Are you lost, my poor little bird?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Who's there?!
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Oh, it's you.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Of course. Who else would call me that?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: This coast is a terrible place to kill time at night.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: The Penal Battalion has the area under control, and the Sea Terrors have been swept clean. I can't imagine what there is to be frightened of.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Sometimes, for landwalkers, the waves can be more heartless than Seaborn.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: The tide's coming in. Mind your feet.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Agh!
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Are you sure you truly understand?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Even if I didn't, I would request for you all to teach me.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: In order to respond to this calamity, I MUST learn.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Such a teacher's pet.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Tell me, then, why exactly did you come here?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I wanted to see where my maestro gave his life again.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: I wanted to follow his teachings and try to overcome the fear in my heart once more.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Ow!
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Wh-What are you hitting my head for?!
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: What a cute reaction.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Heheh. Sooo energetic.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Make sense. Just what are you—
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: You already have the self-confidence to face straight ahead.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Could you describe for me what's down there?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: The sea, the lighthouse, the Penal Battalion's warship. Could they not be more obvious?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Keep going. You should be able to see it.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: The reef, the lights, an unfinished column.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Aaaand?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Exactly how long do you intend to toy with me?!
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Look up.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Just as Irene is about to get truly mad, Specter points into the air. Irene's line of sight follows the Abyssal Hunter's finger, and climbs through the night sky.
She sees the stars filling the firmament, and in an instant her fury vanishes.
You can still feel it, can't you, little bird?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Dreams are weighty things, and you're ready to put in what it takes.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: But when your staunch beliefs pull you to battle, don't let them push life's joys to the back of your mind.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: They might be the most ordinary of things, but they really can save you.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Urgh... nngh...
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Heh, heh. Good little bird. That's what makes you so charming.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: It's time you went back to the nest. Watch your step.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Are you leaving?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Urgh, wait!
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Did you need something?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I think I may have been impolite. I've simply been calling you 'you' all this time.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: You're right. I don't think I've ever introduced myself.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Specter takes two steps back, and lightly lifts her skirt.
The light of the twin moons spills over the hem, the pallid glistening of the waves letting off specks of light, shining over the scripture on her parchment strips.
Hello, Irene of Iberia. I am Specter, Abyssal Hunter.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: If you're willing, you could also call me—Laurentina of Ægir
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Laurentina... Laurentina...
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: What a beautiful name.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Well then, see you, my strong little birdie.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: (Faintly, she hums.)
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Is she... singing?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: When I pray♪
The stars wax in night♪
When I dance♪
The moons shed mournful black♪
When I smile♪
The seas will be witness to my joy♪
